message.value: To manage borders of a configuration
To add border configurations to this game configuration
Cannot add border %s, this border does not exist
Cannot add border %s, this border is already registered
No border has been registered in configuration %s
The border %s has been registered in configuration %s
Borders %s have been registered in configuration %s
To remove border configurations from this game configuration
Cannot remove border %s, this border is not registered for configuration %s
No border has been removed from configuration %s
The border %s has been removed from configuration %s
Borders %s have been removed from configuration %s
To display the name of each registered border for this configuration
List of all registered borders for all worlds :\n%s
List of registered borders for the %s :\n%s
To display characteristics of one or more registered borders for this configuration
Characteristics on all registered borders for the configuration %s :\n%s
